import React from 'react'; import { useQuery, gql } from '@apollo/client'; import { useAuth } from '../utils/AuthContext'; import { XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, AreaChart, Area, RadarChart, PolarGrid, PolarAngleAxis, PolarRadiusAxis, Radar, BarChart, Bar } from 'recharts'; import { LogOut, Award, TrendingUp, Clock, Target, Activity } from 'lucide-react'; // ... (keep the same GraphQL query) const Profile = () => { // ... (keep the same data processing logic) return (
{/* Navigation */}
Learning Analytics

{user.login}

ID: {user.id}

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome back, {user.login}!

Here's your learning progress overview

{/* Stats Grid */}
{/* Total XP Card */}

Total XP

{totalXP.toLocaleString()}

{/* Success Rate Card */}

Success Rate

{auditRatio}%

({passedAudits}/{totalAudits})

{/* Projects Done Card */}

Projects Done

{user.progresses.length}

{/* Learning Hours Card */}

Learning Hours

{Math.round(totalXP / 1000)}

{/* Charts Grid */}
{/* XP Progress Chart */}

XP Progress

{/* Skills Radar Chart */}

Skills Overview

{/* Project Progress */}

Project Progress

); }; export default Profile;
